why_do_you_need_ZMOT.category_1_text: The modern consumer uses Google as the main tool to search for information. Be well positioned in search engines is guaranteed to be present in the moment that people are interested.

specialist.text: ZMOT is a thing of great people. See what the leading experts in Digital Marketing has been talking about it.
specialist.slide_1_text: Consumers search the information on the Internet before buying.
specialist.slide_2_text: That's how consumers live, learn and make decisions today
specialist.slide_3_text: Digital marketing is about delivering the right content at the right time
specialist.slide_4_text: No matter what you do you can do it cheaper, faster and more efficiently on the web.
specialist.slide_5_text: Our jobs as marketers are to understand how the customer wants to buy and help them

services.sub_header: We are here to help you to understand ZMOT and implement it to your day to day game. No matter the size of your pocket, or time availability, we will always have a solution to help you.
services.service_1_description: We can show you the way, or walk beside you. We can help you out of inertia, or speed up your rocket. In the end, it's up to you how to deploy ZMOT in their Digital Marketing actions.
services.service_2_description: Wish to enchant his audience with an innovative, dynamic content and will make people standing cheering?
services.service_3_description: Learn all about ZMOT with expert on the subject and that has helped their organizations to achieve significant results. With our material you can meet and implement the best digital marketing strategies.

zmot_audit.text_1: Wants to speed up the results of your business, but do not know how or where to start?
zmot_audit.text_2: Using the ZMOT framework we can show you the ropes, or even walk with you. We help create and implement actions that the best companies in the world are using to scale their business on the Internet

lectures_events.text_1: If you are organizing an event and need a super current and relevant theme, with a envolvedor storytelling, our Lectures on ZMOT and Consumer Behavior is what you need.
lectures_events.text_2: Whether in a classroom or online event, participants of your event will thank you for helping them to understand how ZMOT can improve the results exponentially.

online_courses.text_1: We know that learning about a new subject, and put it into practice, can be laborious and frustrating.
online_courses.text_2: Therefore, we have prepared a detailed course on ZMOT, that will help you learn the concepts, how to deploy, which tools to use and some cases of companies that are using the ZMOT and getting many results in your Digital Marketing.
online_courses.thank_you_title: Thank you for getting in touch!
online_courses.thank_you_message: We appreciate your interest on ZMOT Institute. One of our colleagues will get back in touch with you soon!
